fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, we're all trying to do what's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, we're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you shouldn't work with her just because you and I are such good friends. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""One thing I wanna make very clear,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One thing I wanna make very clear, Harry, is that this is not some kind of Union *versus* Corporation situation. Everyone is just pals here."

fields.Title: Drama: "Wait... there was no mention of a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait... there was no mention of a casserole from Joyce.

fields.Title: You: ""Funny, Joyce didn't mention any ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Funny, Joyce didn't mention any casserole."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Very cool, Harry." He nods enthusi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very cool, Harry." He nods enthusiastically. "It's very cool."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""He's an old man, Harry. I wanted h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's an old man, Harry. I wanted him to spend more time with his family." He looks down and sighs. "God knows how long he's got left."

fields.Title: You: ""Another question then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Another question then?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "This particular brand of humour he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This particular brand of humour he has... it makes for a fine distraction.

fields.Title: You: ""Joyce said the previous Union lead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce said the previous Union leader vanished under suspicious circumstances."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""*If* she actually wants to see me,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*If* she actually wants to see me, she will find a way. Any good negotiator would. And I just don't have anything to discuss with a bad negotiator."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." The lieutenant seems incre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." The lieutenant seems incredulous.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Honestly, I'm beginning to think *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I'm beginning to think *you're* a midget, Harry." Abruptly, he smiles and changes his tone. "I'm only kidding, Harry. You're not a midget. No one is. We're pals."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, that's very nice. I haven't go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, that's very nice. I haven't gotten around to her yet -- I'm very, very busy, you see." He adjusts a button on his sleeve. "I hope you're getting along."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, another question?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, another question?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, that's cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, that's cool."

fields.Title: You: ""What happened to the previous nego..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened to the previous negotiator, Mr. Gaumont?"

fields.Title: Composure: "His expression makes it clear: this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His expression makes it clear: this is childish and irresponsible behaviour.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's a fortress. He knows she can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a fortress. He knows she can't get in here.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Tell her about *all* of it. My bro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell her about *all* of it. My brother's picture, my singing swordfish clock." He looks around. "Tell her how overweight I am and how I've helped you with your lost gun. Tell her everything -- Evrart doesn't mind."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I tried to help you with the body... I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Great! You wanna bounce something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great! You wanna bounce something off your old friend, Mr. Claire, right?" He seems genuinely pleased. "Well, let's hear it, Harry!"

fields.Title: You: ""Evrart, Joyce seems to think the U..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart, Joyce seems to think the Union is low-balling her."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry. Let me just assu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, Harry. Let me just assure you one more time -- it's perfectly okay to share anything we discuss here with this... *Joyce*. This is a completely transparent organization."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""'Oh, did I leave my casserole on?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Oh, did I leave my casserole on? Better go home and check. The election can wait!'" The man frowns, disapprovingly. "When she got back the whole thing was over."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, please, Harry!" The big man n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, please, Harry!" The big man nods slowly. "Feel free to speak your mind or ask me anything."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Absolutely, Harry! What's on your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely, Harry! What's on your mind?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "It's hard to say if he really lost..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's hard to say if he really lost his temper or if this is another one of his tricks. This man... almost never angers visibly.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I'm helping you get that nasty body down from the tree... *and* with finding your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: You: ""It sounds like you *want* me to te..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It sounds like you *want* me to tell her about our conversations."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Okay then. Positive emotions it is!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay then. Positive emotions it is! You like positive emotions.

fields.Title: Empathy: "If it's spilled blood you're lookin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If it's spilled blood you're looking for then there certainly isn't any in his expression, or demeanour now.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I tried to help you with the body... and *helped* you find your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I helped you get the body down... *and* I'm helping you find your gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I'm helping you get that nasty body down... *and* I helped you find your gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry!" he exclaims, indignant. "I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harry!" he exclaims, indignant. "I have *little people* in my organization. I would never call someone a midget. What is this?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Sure, he thinks. It's about *transp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sure, he thinks. It's about *transparency*.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I helped you get that nasty body down from the tree. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: You: ""Just pals?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just pals?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Whoa... that's so nice of him. Susp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoa... that's so nice of him. Suspiciously nice.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, let's talk about something e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, let's talk about something else." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "Yes, he really doesn't seem to mind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, he really doesn't seem to mind.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yes, he really doesn't seem to mind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, he really doesn't seem to mind.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure? I find it a little o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure? I find it a little odd."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Empty all your barrels on me, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Empty all your barrels on me, Harry."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, Harry, Harry!" He flicks hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harry, Harry, Harry!" He flicks his fingers. "Do not fixate on this little matter. Maybe it was a rabbit stew... or a hair dryer, or an iron. The point is, her heart wasn't in it. Mine *was*."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I helped you find your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: You: ""You called him a midget.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You called him a midget."

fields.Title: Volition: "He doesn't *want* to see her. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't *want* to see her. It's simple as that.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""It's *perfectly* okay. Even if you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's *perfectly* okay. Even if you've told her everything we've talked about, it's *absolutely* fine."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""What do you mean, Harry?" The big..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean, Harry?" The big man sounds annoyed. "Nothing. I let him go."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I'm helping you find your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""And I'm sure you two had a hell of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And I'm sure you two had a hell of a time." He throws a couple of playful punches in your direction. "But I couldn't care less about the bitch. Let's talk about the *real* stuff, Harry. The stuff that matters."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I tried to help you with the body... *and* finding your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I helped you get the body down... *and* to find your lost gun. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""We're all trying to do what's best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're all trying to do what's best for Martinaise here." His smile widens. "Don't feel like you can't cooperate with her, because you and I are such good friends and I'm helping you get that nasty body down from the tree. I'm not a jealous guy."

fields.Title: You: ""I told Joyce that I met you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I told Joyce that I met you."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He seems happy about the prospect o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He seems happy about the prospect of you telling Joyce about your conversations.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""*Vanished*?! Harry, the woman left..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Vanished*?! Harry, the woman left her casserole in the oven and couldn't make it here in time for the voting."

fields.Title: You: ""Why haven't you let her in to see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why haven't you let her in to see you?"

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm just a nice guy, Harry. I woul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm just a nice guy, Harry. I wouldn't be where I am now if I wasn't nice." He slams his fist into his hand. "Politics is all about *emotions*, and I want you to have positive emotions when you think of me."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It *is* rather interesting to tell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It *is* rather interesting to tell people things about each other isn't it? It was nice telling him about her right now...

fields.Title: Half Light: "This is weird. Not *nice* weird, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is weird. Not *nice* weird, but okay.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You cannot but notice the prospect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You cannot but notice the prospect of you telling Joyce about your conversations is actually pleasing Evrart.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, yes -- *low-balling*. Of cour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes -- *low-balling*. Of course..." He's suddenly very serious. "This isn't a casino, Harry. Real people, real livelihoods are at stake here. But everything's a casino for those rich types..."

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""Tell her about all of it. My broth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tell her about all of it. My brother's picture, my singing swordfish clock." He looks around. "Tell her how overweight I am and how I'm helping you find your lost gun. Tell her about everything -- Evrart doesn't mind."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That much is true. His heart *truly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That much is true. His heart *truly* is in it. Though you wouldn't think so by looking at him.

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""No, no, Harry. I'm perfectly neutr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, Harry. I'm perfectly neutral *and* one hundred percent for transparency. I know people say a lot of bad things about the Débardeurs Union, but we are actually," -- he squeaks his chair -- "squeaky clean."

fields.Title: You: ""He made concessions for the compan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He made concessions for the company in previous negotiations. Why would you let an ally like that go?"

fields.Title: Evrart Claire: ""I have no interest in what she is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no interest in what she is doing, but I myself have *nothing* to hide. Your business is your business and I respect your privacy. Just remember, none of this..." He makes an all-encompassing gesture. "... is secret."
